fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Confuse a player during the night.
- Report to a player during the day. 2 Uses

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Confused players will be roleblocked, but won't be informed of such. Investigative roles will still gain results, however these results will be randomized. In cases where they view people (i.e. Lookout and Tracker), report the correct number, but randomize which people.
- When you report to a player during the day, they will gain your exact role *if* they are an Insurgent.
